tagline: The personal site of Pieter Colpaert
body:
I am a researcher in linked open data. I believe a lot of frustration today is caused by bad or misinformation. My goal is to increase your life quality by contextualizing data into information.

You can find me here as well:
[Twitter](http://twitter.com/pietercolpaert), [Google+](https://plus.google.com/110114073598043885251/posts/p/pub), [Linkedin](http://be.linkedin.com/in/pcolpaert/)

## Research

### Publications

 * Colpaert, P., Vander Sande, M., Mannens, E., Van de Walle, R., [Follow The Stars](http://archive.ugent.be/input/download?func=downloadFile&fileOId=1964760&recordOId=1964754),2011
 * Vander Sande, M., Colpaert, P., Van Deursen, D., Mannens, E., Van de Walle, R., [The DataTank: an Open Data adapter with semantic output](http://www2012.org/proceedings/nocompanion/DevTrack_014.pdf)

You can find these on [google scholar](http://scholar.google.be/citations?user=fSlc4YAAAAAJ&hl=nl&oi=ao)

You can find my master's thesis on The DataTank over [here](http://pieter.demo.thedatatank.com/scriptie.pdf)

### Affiliation
 * [UGent](http://ugent.be)
 * [iMinds](http://iminds.be)
 * [Multi Media Lab](http://multimedialab.elis.ugent.be)

## Current projects
 * SoLoMIDEM
 * [The DataTank](http://thedatatank.com)
 * R&Wbase
 * Apps For Europe
 * [iRail Summer of code](http://summerofcode.be)

## Not for profit
I am
 * the chair man of the [Belgian chapter](http://okfn.be) of the [Open Knowledge Foundation](http://okfn.org) in 2013
 * active as a board member of [iRail](http://hello.iRail.be), a Belgian not for profit supporting digital creativity concerning mobility
 * a community coordinator at the [open transport working group](http://transport.okfn.org) at [OKFN](http://okfn.org).

## For profit

Together with [Yeri Tiete](http://tuinslak.be) and [RentalVALUE](http://www.RentalVALUE.be), I have started a company in real-time digital signage called [FlatTurtle](https://flatturtle.com). Follow us on our [blog](http://blog.flatturtle.com).
